name: TwitterFollowVerification
description: Verifies if a user follows the Apex Fusion account on Twitter

parameters.name: bearerToken
parameters.description: The Twitter API Bearer Token used for authenticating API requests.

parameters.name: apexTwitterId
parameters.description: The Twitter user ID of the account that is expected to be followed.

parameters.name: userTwitterId
parameters.description: The Twitter user ID of the user whose following status is being verified.
